statements: SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_medical_records WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Diabetes';
SELECT id, patient_name, date_of_birth, diagnosis, procedure FROM patient_medical_records ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, medication FROM patient_medical_records WHERE medication IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_medical_records WHERE procedure = 'Surgery' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' AND medication = 'Chemotherapy';
SELECT id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_medical_records ORDER BY patient_name ASC, date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT diagnosis FROM patient_medical_records WHERE procedure IN ('MRI Scan', 'X-ray');
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_records ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_records WHERE age > 50;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patient_records WHERE surgery_date > now();
SELECT patient_name, surgeon_name, success FROM patient_records JOIN surgery_simulations ON patient_records.patient_id = surgery_simulations.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_records WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Cancer';
SELECT surgery_date, surgeon_name FROM surgery_simulations ORDER BY simulation_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_simulations FROM surgery_simulations WHERE success = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT record_id, patient_name, medical_history FROM patient_records WHERE patient_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM surgical_team WHERE surgeon_name = 'Dr. Smith' AND nurse_name = 'Jane';
SELECT surgeon_name, assistant_name, nurse_name FROM surgical_team ORDER BY team_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01' LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM patient_records WHERE record_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT surgeon_name, assistant_name, nurse_name FROM surgical_team WHERE team_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';

SELECT patient_name, surgical_team.surgeon_name, surgery_logs.operation_date FROM patient_records JOIN surgery_logs ON patient_records.record_id = surgery_logs.patient_id WHERE surgery_logs.operation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM surgery_logs WHERE procedure_description LIKE '%appendectomy%';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE date_created >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT surgeon_id, first_name, specialty FROM Surgeons ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp FROM SurgeryLogs WHERE surgeon_id = 101 AND record_id = 201;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id), gender FROM Patients GROUP BY gender;

SELECT Patients.first_name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis, SurgeryLogs.timestamp FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id JOIN SurgeryLogs ON MedicalRecords.record_id = SurgeryLogs.record_id;

SELECT first_name AS patient_name, specialty AS surgeon_specialty FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id JOIN Surgeons ON SurgeryLogs.surgeon_id = Surgeons.surgeon_id WHERE diagnosis = 'Appendicitis';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE blood_type = 'AB';
SELECT record_id, record_description, doctor_name FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Surgeries WHERE surgery_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND blood_type = 'O+';
SELECT record_date, doctor_name FROM MedicalRecords WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT surgery_type, surgeon_name FROM Surgeries ORDER BY surgery_date DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT SurgeryRecords.record_description, SurgicalTools.tool_name FROM SurgeryRecords INNER JOIN SurgicalTools ON SurgeryRecords.tool_id = SurgicalTools.tool_id WHERE SurgeryRecords.record_description LIKE '%complicated%' ORDER BY SurgeryRecords.record_description ASC;
